name: Bundle Bounce
description: It's nearing the holidays, which means your company, a world-renown video game developer and console maker, is in a tight squeeze to output all of the items needed by big retailers to maximize profits. You, a lonely worker, are called upon to help complete the final stages of making these items -- Bundling them together! Bundle as many games and consoles as you can, and don't make too many mistakes or it's game over!
